definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: The chemist voided the glass bottle.
sentences.chinese: 這名化學家清空了玻璃瓶。

sentences.english: The siphons emptied lead to deadlocks in the system.
sentences.chinese: 系統中被清空的信標導致死鎖發生。

sentences.english: Let's clear our database for the next chapter.
sentences.chinese: 爲了下一章的練習，讓我們清空我們的數據庫。

sentences.english: Please remove your belt, shoes and jacket, and empty your pockets.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，脫了鞋子，皮帶外套，把口袋清空。

sentences.english: An error occurred while trying to empty the Junk E-mail folder.
sentences.chinese: 試圖清空垃圾郵件文件夾時發生錯誤。

sentences.english: Most of us postpone relaxation until our “inbasket4” is empty.
sentences.chinese: 我們很多人把放鬆推遲到我們的“收文籃”清空之後。

sentences.english: Yes, I have been busy emptying the packing boxes and cleaning up the mats.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我一直在忙着清空包裝箱，清洗席子。

sentences.english: But let's imagine that the brain has been scrubbed clean.
sentences.chinese: 但想象一下大腦已被徹底清空。

sentences.english: Barbarian uprisings now empty most of the mercenary pool for that province.
sentences.chinese: 蠻族叛亂會清空該省可僱用的僱傭兵。

sentences.english: People have a tendency to keep until their plate is clean or the container of cookies is empty.
sentences.chinese: 人們都有種把盤子清空或把曲奇筒喫光的心理傾向。

sentences.english: Most of us postpone relaxation until our "in-basket" is empty.
sentences.chinese: 我們很多人把放鬆推遲到我們的“收文籃”清空之後。

sentences.english: But the soul is going to then, having been scrubbed clean,get a brand new personality.
sentences.chinese: 但這個靈魂，是被完全清空，有全新的人格。

sentences.english: To prepare for the next chapter, let's clear the database.
sentences.chinese: 爲了下一章做準備，讓我們清空數據庫。

sentences.english: After that I cleared out my play-cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 之後我清空了我的遊戲小櫥。

sentences.english: Losing Mind, I'm Slipping FastThe Bottle Empties Courage In Me From A Glass.
sentences.chinese: 失去了心，我滑倒快速瓶子從玻璃清空我勇氣。

sentences.english: People have a tendency to keep eating until their plate is clean or the container of cookies is empty.
sentences.chinese: 人們都有種把盤子清空或把曲奇筒喫光的心理傾向。

definition: to clear up/to tidy up/to dispose of

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)
to stuff full/to cram in/packed tight/chock full
to screen/to block (sth or sb)/to shield/(protective) shield
to destroy (by melting or burning)/to obliterate
to cut/to throw out/to depose (from office)/to tear off
(computing) to clear memory/to reset/to zero (a hard drive)
to hollow out/to empty out/to use up/(finance) tunneling
